Author: Ezz808
Text: Thank you, I was really mad and upset, she knows my history with MH and stuff and why the heck would youmake a comment like that??   Bless you

Author: lunathewisp
Text: Oh gosh I am so so so sorry your mom told you that. She doesn't know what goes on in your mind and how hard this was on you, and she is clearly not a health expert to tell u what u should do with your body. Her comments were super rude and insensitive and uncalled for!! Please just ignore her, she doesn't know any better and u deserve all the happiness in the world and to live a healthy and stress-free life!!!!
